QuestData.Title: Twilight Shores
QuestData.Description: Right then, just hop in the seaplane behind me and I'll fly yeh to the Highlands.$B$BWe're to report to a feller named "Lieutenant Fawkes." I've promised the King we'd get there lickety-fast, so I took the liberty of ditchin' any excess weight. Like seatbelts. Parachutes. Maps. Stabilizers. Landing gear.$B$BI never actually "land" these things anyways.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Lieutenant Fawkes at Highbank in Twilight Highlands.
QuestData.RewardText: You two are the last thing I expected to see fall from the sky. Highbank is under attack!
